definitions.definition: Capable of being perceived very clearly.
definitions.example: Her voice was distinct despite the heavy traffic.

definitions.definition: Different from one another (with the preferable adposition being "from").

definitions.example: Olga's voice is quite distinct because of her accent.

definitions.definition: Separate in place; not conjunct or united; with from.
Distinguished; having the difference marked; separated by a visible sign; marked out; specified.
